actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Interior to convey certain lands in Mesa County, Colorado to Ute Water Conservancy District, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey all rights excepting mineral rights, title, and interest of the United States in and to specified lands in Mesa County, Colorado, to the Ute Water Conservancy District for fair market value less any enhancement brought to the land by the District.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Interior to convey certain lands in Mesa County, Colorado to Ute Water Conservancy District, and for other purposes.
